name: Itty Bitty Tiny Town
description:
Itty Bitty Tiny Town

"I'm sure you'd like to be off on an adventure! Well, there ain't none to be found here!"

As a young video game protagonist with a head full of yet-to-be-crushed dreams, you can't bear to stay on your tiny island home any longer. Search the itsy-bitsy island for resources and craft them into a way out of there, so you can head off and see the world! Who knows what you might discover?

Disclaimer: This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

---

Itty Bitty Tiny Town is a short top-down adventure game made using the PICO-8 fantasy console. You can play the full game for free on this webpage, or download a standalone version for any price. Thanks for playing, and I wish you the best in your voyages!

But seriously, don't give this to your kids.
